title: PVP client auto closes 10 seconds after opening.
body: I recently got a required windows update yesterday. After which today, I have had difficulty with my games freezing graphically, and now its progress to the client auto closing. I open the game, (already ran as adminstrator), login no problems, pvp client shows up, and 10 seconds it auto closes.

replies.body: The freezing issue may be due to the windows update.  Some players have reported this, and it appears to be a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) not interacting well with league.  Disabling that should get it fixed!
